ygData.subject: Re: DeathSteel/the Patrol is back
ygData.msgSnippet: Tyrael smiled. A new addition was always welcome, as were news about the outer world. Tyrael: Good job. So now, we know they are both back licking their wounds

Tyrael smiled. A new addition was always welcome, as were news about
the outer world.

Tyrael: Good job. So now, we know they are both back licking their
wounds by now. Good. Then, our real job can begin.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Darkangel : :
> Darkangel: Routine scout mission. That's when we ran into the
newcomer. A Guardian Robot femme names Synergy. We also picked up a
battle betweem the Maximals and the Predacons. Rather nasty one too.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Tyrael: Good. Where have you two been
lately?
> 
> *************
> 
> Dreadplague transformed and waved her hand at Synergy.
> 
> Dreadplague: Let me show you the way inside the ship. It can be
> puzzling when you're not used to Tripredacus architecture.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > : : Darkangel : :
> > Darkangel lands, transforming to bot mode.
> > 
> > Darkangel: Yes we should hurry.
> > 
> > Darkangel rushes to the bridge.
> > 
> > Darkangel: Darkangel reporting, sir. Dreadplague and myself have
> brought back a possible new recruit.
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Tyrael entered the bridge and went
> straight for the tactical display.
> > Unlike before, there were no more signs of Rust. Only better.
> > 
> > Tyrael: Where are Darkangel and Dreadplague? Kaiser, please wake up. I
> > understand that attitude at your age, but not in a Strategy meeting...
> > 
> > *******************
> > 
> > Dreadplague landed just in front of the base. She had not gotten
> > inside because she wasn't sure if Synergy would be able to get in
> > while in rocket mode.
> > 
> > Dreadplague: Hurry now! The Major has called a meeting and I think it
> > will be an important one.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> > > OOC: Let me repost. His name is DeathSteel. I'm being plagued by
typo 
> > > demons lately.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > DeathSteel::
> > >  He stood up after hearing Tyrael's orders and went to the
bridge. He 
> > > bowed to Tyrael and went to the corner where he could observe
yet not 
> > > be so easily observed.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Tyrael had been waiting for Hydras long enough. With a snort of
> > > > > derision, he transformed to phoenix mode and flew back to
base. He
> > > > > opened a line with all Tirpreds.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Tyrael: To all Tripredacus units, this is Major Tyrael. Meet up 
> > > on 
> > > > the
> > > > > bridge of the ship. We move out soon, so be ready.
> > > > > 
> > > > > It was time to attack and to strike hard. Heads would roll...
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > > DeathSteel:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > He was getting tired of feeling like he had been shelved. He 
> > > > wondered 
> > > > > > what Tyrael was up to. He hadn't heard back from his new 
> > > leader. 
> > > > And 
> > > > > > Kaiser, his supposed new general hadn't called upon him
either. 
> > > > He 
> > > > > > was getting frustrated. He wanted action and a chance to seek 
> > > > rank. 
> > > > > > Not rust to pieces in his room. He got up and wandered the 
> > > halls. 
> > > > He 
> > > > > > found the main communications room and sat down. He picked up 
> > > the 
> > > > > > scanner headset and put it on. Next, he started to adjust
some 
> > > of 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > dials to start picking up most predacon frequencies and
some of 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > maximal frequencies. He listened to the scanner and hoped he 
> > > > would 
> > > > > > find out what was going on.
> >
